page.title: 07ALDWICK BAY ESTATE
page.content:
The Bay Estate is a very high class area on the coast of Bognor. It is a private and{very expensive estate. Some of the houses have thatched roofs, some even have thatched roofs to their garages. The estate has its own private estate agent to deal with the buying and selling of houses. There are lots of houses with french windows leading on to balconies. Some of the houses are timbered and some have leaded windows.
There are some children in our school who live on the estate. One of my friends has six bedrooms and a massive garden like most of the other houses. Another friend said that half of his house is a converted barn.
They have their own private beach and the roads are also private.
